name: golem-hyperdrive
description: Hyperdrive client for the Golem project
author: Marek Franciszkiewicz

scripts.dist:deps: mkdir -p dist/hyperg && npm run dist:deps:sodium && npm run dist:deps:rabin && npm run dist:deps:leveldown
scripts.dist:main:upx: upx dist/hyperg/hyperg || echo 'UPX is not available'
scripts.dist:client:upx: upx dist/hyperg/hyperg-client || echo 'UPX is not available'
scripts.dist: npm run dist:deps && npm run dist:main && npm run dist:main:upx && npm run dist:client && npm run dist:client:upx
